name: Cosmo Bird Table Lamp
description: The Cosmo Bird table lamp by Kifu Paris is a whimsical and sculptural piece, inlaid in either cream shagreen and bronze-patina brass with a beautiful quartz piece in the center or completely in bronze-patina brass with a lapis lazuli piece. The amorphous shapes are an abstract and poetic reinterpretation of a bird flying in a cosmic sky. This piece is a part of the Cosmo II Capsule. This piece is designed by Kifu Augousti, the daughter of Ria and Yiouri Augousti. All shagreen pieces are hand-dyed by artisans.
